line.originaltext: 4 pounds dark meat chicken pieces
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "4 pounds dark meat chicken pieces")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
5 cloves crushed garlic
1/2 cup all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon poultry seasoning
3 (4 ounce) links sweet Italian sausage, sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing5, "3 (4 ounce) links sweet Italian sausage, sliced")

line.originaltext: 1 cup chopped onion
3 carrots, sliced
1/2 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary
1 cup red wine
1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes
line.annotation: create_ing(ing11, "1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes")

line.originaltext: salt and pepper to taste
In a large skillet, heat oil.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Add 1/2 of the garlic.
line.annotation: separate(ing2, ing14, "1/2 of the garlic", ing15, "1/2 of the garlic", "")

line.originaltext: Add 1/2 of the garlic.
Season flour with poultry seasoning.
Dredge chicken parts in flour, then brown in the skillet for 4 or 5 minutes.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing17}, ing18, "floured chicken", "dredge chicken parts in flour")

line.originaltext: Dredge chicken parts in flour, then brown in the skillet for 4 or 5 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing18, t0, ing19, "browned chicken", "brown for 4 or 5 minutes")

line.originaltext: Dredge chicken parts in flour, then brown in the skillet for 4 or 5 minutes.
Add the sausage, and saute for a few minutes.
Add the sausage, and saute for a few minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing21, t0, ing22, "sauteed meat", "saute for a few minutes")

line.originaltext: Add the onion, carrots, mushrooms, rosemary and the remaining garlic.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing22, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing23, "meat mix", "")

line.originaltext: Stir all together.
line.annotation: mix(ing23, t0, ing24, "meat mix", "stir all together")

line.originaltext: Add the wine and tomatoes; stir.
Add the wine and tomatoes; stir.
Cover and let simmer over low heat for 25 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing26, t0, ing27, "simmering stew", "cover and let simmer over low heat for 25 minutes")

line.originaltext: Season with salt and pepper to taste and let simmer for another 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and let simmer for another 10 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing28, t0, ing29, "simmered stew", "simmer for 10 minutes")

line.originaltext: Let cool covered for 10 minutes, then serve.
Let cool covered for 10 minutes, then serve.
